name: PigShroom
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2023

PigShroom is a 2-Player local multiplayer game about a pig rooting for mushrooms to eat, and a mushroom trying to survive.

Game by Aviva, Cat and Rodrigo!

GGJ Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/pigshroom-6

WIN/LOOSE CONDITIONS:
for PIG to win: 
pig eats all of the mushroom's current normal heads
for SHROOM to win: 
pig eats 3 poison mushroom heads

CONTROLS:
mushroom: 
- joystick for movement
- A(xbox)/X(playstation) to spawn normal mushroom
- B(xbox)/O(playstation) to spawn poison mushroom
pig:
- A to move left
- D to move right
- W/Space to jump
- Enter to eat mushroom
